trans-unit.source: Derivative of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"></xref> that is the base class for all composite activity validator components.
trans-unit.target: 파생 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"> </xref> 모든 복합 활동 유효성 검사기 구성 요소에 대 한 기본 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The class provides validation logic for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]이 클래스에 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> 에 대 한 유효성 검사 논리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityValidator"></xref> class.
This method calls Validate on every child <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 모든 자식에 유효성 검사를 호출 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>에 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: It also checks that no more than one <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> is attached to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: 또한 확인 하는 하나만 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> 에 연결 되어</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> 또는</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> of errors found during validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> 유효성 검사 중 발견 된 오류입니다.

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: obj가 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Validates the change based on the affected <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> and provides the error.
trans-unit.target: 영향을 받는에 따라 변경의 유효성을 검사 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> 의 오류를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If validation occurs without error, a null reference (`Nothing`) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Null 참조 오류 없이 유효성 검사가 수행 하는 경우 (`Nothing`)이 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: action is a null reference ().
